author: dcutts
title: Zlatan Ibrahimovic in-line for huge Manchester United bonus after breaking 20 goal mark this season

organizations.name: manchester united tv times manchester united

text:
Zlatan Ibrahimovic in-line for huge Manchester United bonus after breaking 20 goal mark this season 
The 35-year-old striker has been in incredible form since joining United for free from PSG Exclusive Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments ZLATAN Ibrahimovic is in-line for a huge Manchester United bonus after breaking the 20 goal barrier this season. 
The 35-year-old striker has been in incredible form since joining United for free from PSG in the summer. Getty Images 4 Zlatan Ibrahimovic set to get Manchester United bonus after breaking the 20 goal barrier 
The Swede had a number of add-ons inserted into his £300,000-a-week deal, including becoming the Premier League Golden Boot winner. 
And after notching a hat-trick against St Etienne and netting at Blackburn, he is set for a hefty cash windfall . 
An Old Trafford insider revealed: “After breaking 20 goals, Zlatan is poised to get a rather nice lump of cash. PA Ibrahimovic scored a hat-trick against St Etienne last week Getty Images 4 Jose Mourinho and Ibrahimovic get on well and the United boss wants him to stay 
“He had loads of add-ons in his contract like he had at PSG in terms of targets for goals and appearances. 
“He is also in the money if he finishes top scorer in the league and if he’s top of the goal charts at the club. 
“Ibra has been nothing short of a revelation since coming in and it’s no surprise to anyone here he has done so well.” Zlatan Ibrahimovic goal against Blackburn is the Gillette Precision Moment More on Manchester United TV Times Manchester United vs Southampton: What TV channel is the EFL Cup final on and when is it? Team news ManUnited vs Southampton team news: Henrikh Mkhitaryan and Michael Carrick both set to miss EFL Cup final CUSH-TY GIFT Man United arrive home from Saint-Etienne... and one lucky fan at the airport bags Jose Mourinho's neck cushion Whatever it takes Die-hard Manchester United fan Rachel Riley cheers on team with cheeky off-camera TV set-up INSIDE the Countdown studio 'I SHOULD haVE KICKED HIM HARDER' Man United icon Eric Cantona on how that king-fu kick 'felt great' and why an ex-Liverpool star is his favourite player RED MIST Eric Bailly set to miss Europa League last 16 first-leg after being sent off for second yellow against St Etienne MIDWEEK MADNESS Why are Man United playing their Europa League tie against Saint Etienne on a Wednesday? Sweet FA Jose Mourinho fumes as Man United's FA Cup tie at Chelsea is moved to Monday on Europa League week 
It is not known how much Ibrahimovic has landed for reaching the goal mark, but it is expected to be in six-figures. 
United offered Monaco star Radamel Falcao similar incentives when he joined them on loan in 2015. The Swede had a number of add-ons inserted into his £300,000-a-week dea 
Ex-Barcelona and Juventus ace Ibrahimovic has scored a stunning 24 times in 37 appearances already this campaign.
